name: DYNASTY WARRIORS: Gundam Reborn
description:
Gundam comes to life in the classic Dynasty Warriors series like never before! Experience the thrill of reliving your favorite epic battles from the Gundam Universe in epic battlefields with hundreds of opponents! Play as your favorite Mobile Suits from series such as Gundam Seed and Gundam Unicorn for the first time ever! Features over 100 playable Mobile Suits and thrilling story episodes for each series represented!

1-2 players
2MB minimum save size
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
DUALSHOCK®3
Network Features
Network Players 2-2

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.
